attributes.action: retain the United Kingdom rather than continuing devolution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are a small nation as it is, and separation of England, Scotland and Wales does not make sense.
I consider myself British, rather than any of the above. Some people happen to have, for example, one English and one Scottish parent.
The history of the nations of the UK is obviously interlinked.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
